5 ☆☆☆☆☆ 5

Pedrinho Sangrento.title: The Children's Crusade (Part. I)
Pedrinho Sangrento.about:
the rain bathed dusk softly like a thin white silk veil and as gems rested under our pillows, clouds of marble covered our sleepy heads...
we slept as moths in a cocoon, but so aware of the outside world we could feel the rain falling gently on our fertil garden soil...
early in the morning, the king's feast started...
it was Anna and me at the dollhouse, living our blue satin childhood dreams, birds singing like musicboxes in the garden, a thousand silk worms in the trees, a huge variety of extremely colorful bugs eating the fruits from our trees with joy, candles and incenses endlessly setting the mood for celebrating love...
The runes will help you to decode the message...
Pedrinho Sangrento.credits:
released April 1, 2020
Produced by Lunais + Ezlo Montblanc.
Vaporwave Is Not Dead.
